segments.text: That looks like a bad accident .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , should we get out and help ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , there ’ s a police car behind us . He ’ ll stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Looks like the one guy lost control in all this rain , and the other one hit him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . It ’ s pretty bad , that car looks like a coke can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These accidents always cause traffic jams on rainy days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it looks like we ’ re in for a long drive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , well . Put on the news . I got up late and missed it .
segments.speaker: S2
